languages.text: "Вы... вы же не можете стоять в стороне, когда ваши вассалы терзают ваши миры?! Губернатор творит что пожелает! Забирает членов семей, уничтожает целые поселения!"

traits.locale_text: "Вы... вы же не можете стоять в стороне, когда ваши вассалы терзают ваши миры?! Губернатор творит что пожелает! Забирает членов семей, уничтожает целые поселения!"

languages.text: "You... you can't just stand aside while your vassals are destroying your worlds! The governor is doing whatever she wants! Rounding up families, razing whole settlements!"
languages.original_text: "Вы... вы же не можете стоять в стороне, когда ваши вассалы терзают ваши миры?! Губернатор творит что пожелает! Забирает членов семей, уничтожает целые поселения!"

traits.locale_text: "You... you can't just stand aside while your vassals are destroying your worlds! The governor is doing whatever she wants! Rounding up families, razing whole settlements!"
"You... you can't just stand aside while your vassals are destroying your worlds! The governor is doing whatever she wants! Rounding up families, razing whole settlements!"
"You... you can't just stand aside while your vassals are destroying your worlds! The governor is doing whatever she wants! Rounding up families, razing whole settlements!"
"You... you can't just stand aside while your vassals are destroying your worlds! The governor is doing whatever she wants! Rounding up families, razing whole settlements!"

languages.text: 「陛下…臣下があなたの星を破壊しているというのに、陛下はただ見てるんですか！総督は自分の好き勝手にしてる！そこに暮らす人たちごと、開拓地を全部破壊してるんですよ！」
languages.original_text: "You... you can't just stand aside while your vassals are destroying your worlds! The governor is doing whatever she wants! Rounding up families, razing whole settlements!"

traits.locale_text: 「陛下…臣下があなたの星を破壊しているというのに、陛下はただ見てるんですか！総督は自分の好き勝手にしてる！そこに暮らす人たちごと、開拓地を全部破壊してるんですよ！」

languages.text: “你……你的总督正在破坏你的世界，你不能就这么袖手旁观！那个总督为所欲为！她抄家灭族，把整个定居点夷为平地！”
languages.original_text: "You... you can't just stand aside while your vassals are destroying your worlds! The governor is doing whatever she wants! Rounding up families, razing whole settlements!"

traits.locale_text: “你……你的总督正在破坏你的世界，你不能就这么袖手旁观！那个总督为所欲为！她抄家灭族，把整个定居点夷为平地！”

languages.text: «¡No puede quedarse al margen mientras sus propios vasallos destruyen sus mundos! ¡La gobernadora hace lo que le sale de las narices! ¡Separa familias, asola asentamientos enteros!».
languages.original_text: "You... you can't just stand aside while your vassals are destroying your worlds! The governor is doing whatever she wants! Rounding up families, razing whole settlements!"

traits.locale_text: «¡No puede quedarse al margen mientras sus propios vasallos destruyen sus mundos! ¡La gobernadora hace lo que le sale de las narices! ¡Separa familias, asola asentamientos enteros!».

languages.text: "Ihr ... Ihr könnt nicht einfach daneben stehen, während Eure Lehnsherren Eure Welten vernichten! Die Gouverneurin macht, was immer sie will! Sie treibt Familien zusammen, macht ganze Ansiedlungen dem Erdboden gleich!"
languages.original_text: "You... you can't just stand aside while your vassals are destroying your worlds! The governor is doing whatever she wants! Rounding up families, razing whole settlements!"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr ... Ihr könnt nicht einfach daneben stehen, während Eure Lehnsherren Eure Welten vernichten! Die Gouverneurin macht, was immer sie will! Sie treibt Familien zusammen, macht ganze Ansiedlungen dem Erdboden gleich!"

languages.text: « Vous... Vous pouvez pas rester les bras croisés pendant que vos vassaux s'amusent à détruire des mondes ! La gouverneure en fait qu'à sa tête, elle enlève des familles et rase des villages entiers ! »
languages.original_text: "You... you can't just stand aside while your vassals are destroying your worlds! The governor is doing whatever she wants! Rounding up families, razing whole settlements!"

traits.locale_text: « Vous... Vous pouvez pas rester les bras croisés pendant que vos vassaux s'amusent à détruire des mondes ! La gouverneure en fait qu'à sa tête, elle enlève des familles et rase des villages entiers ! »

languages.text: "Siz... Siz, vasallarınız dünyalarınızı yok ederken seyirci kalamazsınız! Vali canı ne isterse onu yapıyor! Yuvaları yıkıyor, koca yerleşim yerlerini yerle bir ediyor!"
languages.original_text: "You... you can't just stand aside while your vassals are destroying your worlds! The governor is doing whatever she wants! Rounding up families, razing whole settlements!"

traits.locale_text: "Siz... Siz, vasallarınız dünyalarınızı yok ederken seyirci kalamazsınız! Vali canı ne isterse onu yapıyor! Yuvaları yıkıyor, koca yerleşim yerlerini yerle bir ediyor!"
